Home » 30Vbh Vibhaṅgapāḷi » 6 Paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅga » 6.2 Abhidhammabhājanīya » 6.2.13 Kusalamūlakavipākaniddesa » 6.2.13.1 Ahetukakusalavipākacitta
6.2.13.1.1 Cakkhuviññāṇacitta
Paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅga
Abhidhammabhājanīya
Kusalamūlakavipākaniddesa
Ahetukakusalavipākacitta
Cakkhuviññāṇacitta
343.
1307Katame dhammā abyākatā? Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
344.
1308Tattha katamo kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro? Yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ—  ayaṃ vuccati “kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro” …pe…  tena vuccati “evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī”ti.
